1.title: Pilot: It's Not a Puma
1.plot: All hell breaks loose when Peter leaves Ray and Winston to watch a cat that turns out to be pure evil in order to win the affection of his lady friend. The boys and girls of SOL pull together to fight off the devil cat, destroying Ray's apartment in the process.

2.title: Ladies Man
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A comedy about four young adults who have remained friends for a number of years for no other reason than the simple fact that they have no better options for the company they keep. The show is centered around Ray, the level headed one; Dana, the spunky, ambitious one; Peter, the dry wit, sarcastic and somewhat self centered one; and Winston, the neurotic, unemployed one that sleeps on Ray's couch.
